Articles.Content:
has anyone heard any solid info from squad regarding hinges and folding parts? will it ever happen? why hasn't it happened already?

now that we have cargo bays it would be very helpful to be able to fold up payloads.

infernal robotics is a great mod and looks much better than it did, but the UI is not so great.

and besides, hinges and rotation parts are so useful surely they should be available as stock.

The closest we have to official word is that robotics parts are on the What Not to Suggest List, so I'll have to close this thread.

Have you taken a look at the Infernal Robotics Rework parts? There are other parts packs in the IR OP, too.

Edit:

Also, the last official word I can find is that HarvesteR discussed the idea and liked it. That doesn't mean robotic/mechanical parts will make it into 1.0, or ever.

Edited January 23, 2015 by Master Tao
